vexMod:ConsolationPrize.NAME: Consolation Prize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain that much #yGold.

vexMod:PlagueVial.NAME: Plague Vial
vexMod:PlagueVial.FLAVOR: This sentient sickness seeks dangerous entities.
DESCRIPTIONS: Non-Boss enemies have #b15 % less HP.

vexMod:ColdYogurt.NAME: Cold Yogurt
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yFrost.

vexMod:ShiftingSkin.NAME: Shifting Skin
vexMod:ShiftingSkin.FLAVOR: Your body flows fluidly, becoming subtly spikier in response to blows.
DESCRIPTIONS: After being attacked, gain temporary #yThorns equal to damage intended.

vexMod:ProtectorBot.NAME: Protector Bot
vexMod:ProtectorBot.FLAVOR: This little bot dives in to take attacks when you're wide open.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #b1 or less cards in a turn, gain #b8 #yBlock at the end of the turn.

vexMod:PainConverter.NAME: Pain Converter
vexMod:PainConverter.FLAVOR: The machine seems to be magnetically attracted to your exposed injuries.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you take #b15 or more damage in one hit, gain [E] and draw a card next turn.

vexMod:BetterTron.NAME: Better-O-Tron
vexMod:BetterTron.FLAVOR: This mechanical worm lurches for your head intermittently.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b3 unupgraded cards you add to your deck are #yUpgraded.

vexMod:GhostlyGear.NAME: Ghostly Gear
vexMod:GhostlyGear.FLAVOR: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Strike or Defend, #yExhaust it.

vexMod:CursedCompass.NAME: Cursed Compass
vexMod:CursedCompass.FLAVOR: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL Future maps have only #b1 path.

vexMod:ConcentrateValve.NAME: Concentration Valve
vexMod:ConcentrateValve.FLAVOR: The more you focus, the more it focuses you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b2 #yPowers in a turn, gain #b1 #yFocus.

vexMod:BejeweledOrb.NAME: Bejeweled Orb
vexMod:BejeweledOrb.FLAVOR: You have an urge to match items of similar color.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have #b3 of the same type of Orb in a row, Evoke them and #yChannel #b2 random Orbs.

vexMod:MemoryStick.NAME: Memory Stick
vexMod:MemoryStick.FLAVOR: Holding it makes you think back to distant memories.
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of each combat, #yRetain your hand.

vexMod:CoolingFan.NAME: Cooling Fan
vexMod:CoolingFan.FLAVOR: This fan helps you save processes when performing monster solution options.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, gain #b2 #yBlock.

vexMod:Cooldron.NAME: Cooldron
vexMod:Cooldron.FLAVOR: This cauldron is a lot cooler than any regular old cauldron.
DESCRIPTIONS: All Potions you obtain are Entropic Brews.

vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.NAME: Invisible Cloak
vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.FLAVOR: You're far too modest to "wear" this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, ALL enemies lose #b1 #yStrength.

vexMod:CodeSmelter.NAME: Code Smelter
vexMod:CodeSmelter.FLAVOR: Combines subprocesses into one big clump. Simple!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.

vexMod:TanglingVine.NAME: Tangling Vine
vexMod:TanglingVine.FLAVOR: It reaches at you, filled with malicious intents...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yConstricted.

vexMod:MindDevourer.NAME: Mind Devourer
vexMod:MindDevourer.FLAVOR: You can feel knowledge of techniques and attacks drifting away as you hold it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the end of each combat, a random card in your deck is removed.

vexMod:SpinShoes.NAME: Spin Shoes
vexMod:SpinShoes.FLAVOR: You cannot remove these shoes, and they keep making you trip.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, #yTransform ALL cards in your deck into #rClumsy.
Oops! You fell down...

vexMod:HappyDrink.NAME: Happy Drink
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b1 Max HP. NL Whenever you enter a shop, gain #b1 Max HP.

vexMod:ShortStop.NAME: Short Stop
vexMod:ShortStop.FLAVOR: Weathered from hundreds of home runs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Future maps are 9 floors long.

vexMod:EnergyShake.NAME: Energy Shake
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, brews #b1 random potion.
Mm, protein...

vexMod:PukeWorm.NAME: Puke Worm
vexMod:PukeWorm.FLAVOR: This tiny worm pukes up coins when you impress it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of battle, gain #b2 #yGold.

vexMod:PitifulBounty.NAME: Pitiful Bounty
vexMod:PitifulBounty.FLAVOR: Whoever this criminal was, you'd only get a gold piece for them.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, gain #b3 #yBlock.

vexMod:ThoughtMold.NAME: Helpful Mold
vexMod:ThoughtMold.FLAVOR: This mold siphons off bits of your shield to feed you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yBlock, gain #b1 #yStrength this turn only.

vexMod:SalvageTools.NAME: Salvaging Tools
vexMod:SalvageTools.FLAVOR: "Curious! These primitive things are utterly useless." -Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1 this turn.

vexMod:ChargeUpper.NAME: Charge Upper
vexMod:ChargeUpper.FLAVOR: "Oops, I fell asleep without plugging it in..."
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you gain #b25 #yBlock, gain #b1 #yStrength.

vexMod:FocusSash.NAME: Focus Sash
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage that would bring you to #b0 HP from over #b15 HP brings you to #b1 HP instead.

vexMod:PowerCharger.NAME: Power Charger
vexMod:PowerCharger.FLAVOR: Conserve energy! Shut off Orb slots when you're not using them.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b1 Block for each empty Orb slot.

vexMod:StrikeShooter.NAME: Strike Shooter
vexMod:StrikeShooter.FLAVOR: All your sword-firing needs in one medium package!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every third turn, play a Strike at a random target.

vexMod:SystemVirus.NAME: System Virus
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of each combat, lose #b2 Orb slots.

vexMod:MoralityCore.NAME: Morality Core
vexMod:MoralityCore.FLAVOR: "Iron one, you gave so much for your strength... and now you give it up as well."
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yWeak.

vexMod:StickyTar.NAME: Sticky Tar
vexMod:StickyTar.FLAVOR: "Quiet one, you think yourself so clever with your dodgy moves. Be exposed!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of each combat, lose #b1 #yDexterity.

vexMod:BigBerry.NAME: Big Berry
vexMod:BigBerry.FLAVOR: A fruit long thought to be forgotten. The Spireblight proved to be quite the preservative.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 22.

vexMod:RetaliationKit.NAME: Retaliation Kit
vexMod:RetaliationKit.FLAVOR: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke not included.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time your #yBlock is broken each combat, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

vexMod:KeyChain.NAME: Key Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first #yAttack each combat Shackles its target for damage dealt.

vexMod:CardConverter.NAME: Box of Bandaids
vexMod:CardConverter.FLAVOR: Vends only when shown cool techniques.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal #b5 HP.

vexMod:CursedBlade.NAME: Sword of Lies
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength. At the start of each combat, add a random #rCurse to your hand.

vexMod:DrawConverter.NAME: Thoughtsguard
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card (besides your opening hand), gain #b2 #yBlock.

vexMod:BrokenBowl.NAME: Broken Bowl
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add an unupgraded card to your deck, #yUpgrade it and lose #b2 Max HP.

vexMod:PillTracker.NAME: Pill Tracker
vexMod:PillTracker.FLAVOR: Always remember to take your medication on time!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b5, remove all your Debuffs.

vexMod:SlimeArmor.NAME: Scavenger Helm
vexMod:SlimeArmor.FLAVOR: Used by the tribes far from the City.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #b1 card in your hand at the end of your turn, you may #yRetain it.

vexMod:ScavengeHelm.NAME: Writhing Mask
vexMod:ScavengeHelm.FLAVOR: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yMalleable.

vexMod:ToySword.NAME: Toy Sword
vexMod:ToySword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a little sword charm!
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks Shackle their targets for 2 Strength. Start each combat with -1 Strength.

vexMod:DoubleEdgedSword.NAME: Double-Edged Sword
vexMod:DoubleEdgedSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you an overly sharp blade!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 2 Strength and each enemy gains 2 Thorns.

vexMod:BroadSword.NAME: Broadsword
vexMod:BroadSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a slightly oversized weapon!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 3 Strength. You draw one less card each turn.

vexMod:DiamondSword.NAME: Diamond Sword
vexMod:DiamondSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a rather blocky sword!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 3 Gold.

vexMod:RustySword.NAME: Rusty Sword
vexMod:RustySword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a crumbling sword...
DESCRIPTIONS: You start each combat with -1 Strength. Enemies start each combat with -2 Strength.

vexMod:DrainingSword.NAME: Draining Sword
vexMod:DrainingSword.FLAVOR: The smith fashioned you a vampiric sword!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, heal 1 HP. You start each combat with -1 Strength.

vexMod:ImaginarySword.NAME: Imaginary Sword
vexMod:ImaginarySword.FLAVOR: Already, your memories of a smith feel faint...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove two Attack cards from your deck.
You have forgotten...

vexMod:InfernalSword.NAME: Infernal Sword
vexMod:InfernalSword.FLAVOR: This sword burns endlessly. You can't even hold it...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
